name: Test Motorbike
description:
Test Motorbike is game is very addictive and realistic. If you want to experience extreme motorcycle racing game, 

this is the game that you should try. Riding a motorbike is definitely more challenging than even the most extreme 

car driving simulator. That’s because you have to control everything at once: your direction, the speed, and how you throttle. 

To succeed as drift racer, you must give your 110%

Features:

Realistic and immersive game graphic & sound.

Unlock various challenges and tracks.

Try your hand at riding low cc scooters and turbo bikes

Perform awesome motorcycle stunts on your bikes.

Intuitive and response game control.
